###1-1

```{r}
i<-1:1000


epsilon_i<-rnorm(n=1000,mean=0,sd=1)

```

###1-2

```{r}
i<-1:1000
t_i<- {2*pi*i}/{1000}
x1<- sin(t_i)
x2<- cos(4*t_i)
```

###1-3

```{r}
i<-1:1000

t_i<- {2*pi*i}/{1000}

x1<- sin(t_i)
x2<- cos(4*t_i)

y_i<- 1.5 + 5*x1 + 3*x2 + epsilon_i

plot(t_i, y_i, col='gray60')
```


###1-4

```{r}
i<-1:1000

t_i<- {2*pi*i}/{1000}

x1<- sin(t_i)
x2<- cos(4*t_i)

X=cbind(1,x1,x2)
```


###1-5

```{r}
𝜷=cbind(c(1.5,5,3))
X𝜷 <- X%*%𝜷

plot(t_i, y_i, col='gray60')
lines(t_i,X𝜷 , col="red",lwd='5')
```


###1-6


```{r}
X_t<-t(X)
XtX_ <- solve(X_t%*%X)

hat𝜷= XtX_%*%X_t%*%y_i
hat𝜷
```


###1-7


```{r}
X_hat𝜷<- X%*%hat𝜷

plot(t_i, y_i, col='gray60')
lines(t_i,X𝜷 , col="red",lwd='5')
lines(t_i,X_hat𝜷 , lty="dashed", col="blue",lwd='5')

```


###2-1

```{r}
x=seq(from=-1.96,to=1.96,by=0.01)
y=(1/sqrt(2*pi))*exp(-x^2/2)

xx=runif(10000)*4-2
yy=runif(10000)
plot(xx,yy)
lines(x,y,col='red',lwd=3)

test = function(xx,yy){
    yy < (1/sqrt(2*pi))*exp(-xx^2/2)
}

print(c(xx[1],yy[1])) 
print((1/sqrt(2*pi))*exp(-xx[1]^2/2))
test(xx[1],yy[1])

plot(xx,yy,col='gray')
lines(x,y,col='red',lwd=3)
points(xx[1],yy[1],col='blue')
points(xx[1],(1/sqrt(2*pi))*exp(-xx[1]^2/2),col='red')

tst = c()
for (i in 1:10000) tst[i] = test(xx[i],yy[i])
head(tst)

plot(xx,yy,col='gray')
lines(x,y,col='red',lwd=3)
points(xx[tst],yy[tst],col='red')


sum(tst)/10000*4



```


###2-2

```{r}

library(tidyverse)

x<-rnorm(1000)
dim(x)=c(1000,1)
x= as_tibble(x)
x %>% filter(V1>-1.96&V1<1.96)

```
